projects.mainTitle: Parachute Creek Property Wildlife Habitat Enhancement Plan
mainContent: WestWater developed a Wildlife Habitat Enhancement Plan for an oil and gas operator to implement on company-owned land to mitigate impacts associated with increasing development of natural gas production and processing facilities on the property.

Work associated with this plan included an inventory of existing conditions, developing mitigation action recommendations, and prioritization of mitigation actions based on value to the wildlife species using the property.

pageContext.project: Parachute Creek Property Wildlife Habitat Enhancement Plan
